original_title: Anura Kumara to be sworn in as President today
original_body_lines: National People’s Power (NPP) leader Anura Kumara Dissanayake is scheduled to be sworn in today (23) as the 9th Executive President of Sri Lanka.
Mr. Dissanayake is scheduled to be sworn in as the President before Chief Justice Jayantha Jayasuriya this morning at the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo.
